data.market_trends: Travel trends indicate an increase in sustainable tourism and a focus on responsible travel in culturally rich destinations.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly using online platforms for direct bookings and relying on user reviews for decision-making. Flexibility and cancellation policies are key influencing factors in bookings.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala competes with surrounding Central American countries like Honduras and El Salvador, offering distinct cultural and historical experiences.
data.seasonal_factors: Seasonal variations greatly influence traveler numbers, with peaks during December holidays and summer vacation months.
